Accommodation Outrigger Kona Resort & Spa + Kohala Canopy Zipline Adventure (4 stars) The Outrigger Kona Resort & Spa offers a multi-level fantasy pool with a 200-foot water slide, manta-ray viewing and sweeping views of the Pacific Ocean. Enjoy activities including yoga, lei making, hula lessons, ukulele lessons and cultural tours of the historic fishing village on property. The rooms and suites offer island inspired décor and furnished lanais overlooking Keauhou Bay, the lava cliffs, mountains, and beautifully landscaped grounds. Experience the flavours of the Island of Hawaii and the Kona coast at the two dining experiences serving locally sourced food and drinks. Kohala Canopy Zipline Adventure - Immerse yourself in the lush rainforests of the Kohala region. This guided tour allows participants to soar through treetops on a variation of ziplines and cross exciting suspension bridges, all while enjoying panoramic views of the stunning landscape. It's an eco-friendly adventure designed for fun and safety, suitable for both beginners and experienced zipliners. Captain Zodiac Raft Expedition - Embark on a thrilling ocean adventure along the stunning Kona Coast on the Big Island of Hawaii. Known for its fast and manoeuvrable inflatable rafts, this tour provides an exciting and intimate experience of the island’s marine wonders. Enjoy snorkelling in crystal-clear waters, explore sea caves, and witness the diverse marine life.
